name: Random Digivolution Challenge
description: Build your team from randomly selected Digimon that unlock as you progress through the story. Random digivolution begins once digivolution is unlocked.

rules.title: Level Cap
rules.description: Max level restricted to 7 below upcoming boss level

rules.title: Random Team
rules.description: Team must be built from randomly determined Digimon (no duplicates). You get a new random team for each boss group.

rules.title: Digivolution Restriction
rules.description: Only use Digimon up to your current unlocked digivolution generation. New generations unlock at specific boss checkpoints.

challengeClarifications: If the player cannot get a Digimon from the rolled team: keep Digimon from the previous challenge team, only use Digimon available from the rolled team (cannot add from outside the challenge's roster), or re-roll picks that are impossible (no digivolution/dedigivolution paths accessible).
Teams persist across multiple bosses within the same boss group. A new team is rolled only when starting a new boss group.
